ygData.subject: Re: Bank and Farie Dragons
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Hmm, never killed those. I ve always played a good-natured elf of some sort. Because of this I avoid harming fay creatures if I can help it, especially due
ygData.messageBody:
>From: tjaxon@...
>Reply-To: eqbards@onelist.com
>To: eqbards@onelist.com
>Subject: Re: [eqbards] Bank and Farie Dragons
>Date: Wed, 26 May 1999 06:23:03 -0700
>
>From: tjaxon@...
>
>Beth Moursund wrote:
> >
> > From: Beth Moursund <scrybsprite@...>
> >
> > >2. What's up with Farie Dragons? The little guys with butterfly
>wings. Are
> > >they monsters to hunt? Do they have a bad faction adjustment when
>killed. Do
> > >they have good treasure? No one seems to be hunting them. Yes they're
> > >beautiful but that doesn't seem to stop most people.
> >
> > They reduce your faction with SkyTalons, whatever that is. (Dragons
>maybe?)
> >
> > They sometimes have a gem or piece of jewelry. No cash.
> >
> > - Windsong Wanderer, bard on Solusek Ro
>
>Hmmmm....I hunt Faerie Dragons (known as Fae Drakes) in the Lesser
>Faydark...sometimes they hunt ME! However, the reason I hunt them is
>for the cash - most I get have one or two gold on them...
>
>Shadren, Guard-Bard of Cazic Thule
>

Hmm, never killed those. I've always played a good-natured elf of some sort.
Because of this I avoid harming fay creatures if I can help it, especially
due to the possible faction hit. I also remember once when i was brand new
and about 3rd level i attacked what I thought was a pixie trixter, but
turned out to be a faerie duchess. I had lasted all of 2 seconds.

Sartori D'Elsiraad
Bard of Kelethin
Veeshan
